snippet.title: Russia fires first shots of Crimea invasion - Ukraine update - Truthloader

localized.description:
Two days ago Russia invaded its neighbour Ukraine, seizing control of the Crimea peninsula where the majority of Ukrainians are Russian speakers and where some of the population has been calling for the region to secede. In today's update on this ever-developing situation, we look at a "nonsense ultimatum" that may or may not have been issued by Russia, threatening military action against Ukrainian forces, what happened when Russian troops fired warning shots at Ukrainian soldiers, the so-called military "exercises" that Russia's been conducting near to the Ukrainian border, and the war of words between Russia and the West that's showing no sign of stopping.

Subscribe to our channel: http://bit.ly/TRUsub

Truthloader is a channel dedicated to citizen journalism. We find the best examples of crowd-sourced video and independent content, then use our expertise to add context and analysis. We respond to the stories you're interested in, so if you've got a story you'd love us to get to the bottom of, tweet us, Facebook us, or respond to our videos with a comment - and perhaps check out our reddit.
